lead_paragraph: Peru advanced to the Copa América quarterfinals by coming from behind twice — the second time playing a man short — to tie Bolivia, 2-2, last night in Mérida, Venezuela. Venezuela and Uruguay tied, 0-0, in a later match. Each will advance to the knockout round.
